ComicInfo.Title: The Chest of Death; "True" Ghost Armies; Were-Spider's Doom; The Tomb of the Unseen; The Witch's Curse
ComicInfo.Summary: Mrs. Black (a half human/half spider hybrid), preys on victims in her lonely Smokey Mountains home. Unfortunately for her, one of her victims turns out to be a half human/half wasp hybrid named Mr. Vespid!
